Posts.Content: nikki500 wrote: ive had a lump in my upper breast for a year. Being 25 with no pain i wasnt worried. Now i have a deep dent on the under side of the same breast along with discharge and a flaky sore thats been there for a month. The breast also hangs about an inch lower than the other. Ill be going to a breast clinic next week and im curious as to what tests the doctor may want to do based on these symptoms? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: what will the doctor do? nikki500 awb
